Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's a perfect match for your needs. We're offering this exceptional item at a special price of $12000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
